base_description: Black rectangular microwave with digital keypad.
part_description: Features a large front door, digital display, and keypad with multiple buttons on the right. The door has a handle on the side.
internal_interaction_description: The keypad allows for setting cooking time and power levels, which the microwave uses to generate heat inside the chamber. The door, when closed, creates a sealed environment for efficient cooking.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with users through the keypad for inputting commands. Requires an electrical outlet for power and accommodates various food items placed inside for heating or cooking.
